LanguageData.val_needPointReform_d: This is the point value required for the first reform.
LanguageData.val_needPointReformStep_d: Adjusts the amount of points needed to increase with each reform.
LanguageData.val_maxMemeCount_d: This is the maximum number of memes an ideology can have.
LanguageData.val_memeSelectCount_d: The number of memes that appear randomly as during ideological reform.
LanguageData.val_preceptSelectCount_d: During ideological reform, the number of modifiable Precepts displayed at random.
LanguageData.val_rerollsPerStage_d: The number of available meme rerolls. Spent rerolls resets after a successful reform.
